title: Peullaseutig-eulo Gadeugchan Sesang, Ili Aideul-i Majuhal Milaega Doel Su Issseubnida.

synonyms: A World Full of Plastic Can Be the Future for Our Children
alternative_titles.ja: 플라스틱으로 가득찬 세상, 우리 아이들이 마주할 미래가 될 수 있습니다.

synopsis:
A stop-motion commercial made for Greenpeace.

In the year 2050, a man and his granddaughter catch a fish full of plastic, a result of pollution created decades earlier.
